name: Lune's Mooncatch
description:
Oh no! Lune's favorite biscuits, the crescent moon cakes, have spread across town! He lost 10... Help him find them!

So this is a game I made in under 24 hours for my brother @kwonoaphantom on Twitter. (give him a follow btw, he's very cool) Being made in under a day, it obviously has a heckton of issues. But still, I'm glad I managed to pull it off, maybe this'll get an update someday!
